text: Berndt Stübner (16 February 1947 – 2 June 2022) was a German actor, puppet maker, playwright and theatre director. His best known movie roles were in Wedding Night in the Rain, Frau Venus und ihr Teufel, Hauptmann Florian von der Mühle, Seine Hoheit – Genosse Prinz, and Weil ich dich liebe.... ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German theatre directors Category:Writers from Leipzig Category:German playwrights Category:German stage actors Category:German movie actors
title: Berndt Stübner
